R0064.title: Order-Splitting Arbitrage
R0064.definition: Exploiting shipping thresholds, price differences, or bundled gift items by placing abnormal combined orders and then canceling part of the order to extract benefits.
R0064.description: Many trading platforms offer free shipping above a certain amount, tiered discounts, gifts, or rebates. Attackers first build up an order to meet the benefit threshold, then return some or all of the items to extract the benefit.
R0064.influence: Extracts platform or merchant discounts and rebates.
